content: I will join Meta@Paris as a research scientist intern!
Our paper RAVENEA was accepted at ICLR 2026!
Our paper VISOTHELLO was accepted at EMNLP 2025!
Our paper VLCA was accepted at TACL, presented at EMNLP 2024!
Our paper FoodieQA was accepted at EMNLP 2024!
Our paper Understanding Retrieval Robustness for Retrieval-Augmented Image Captioning was accepted to ACL 2024!
Our paper Structural Similarities Between Language Models and Neural Response Measurements was accepted to NeurReps@NeurIPS 2023
Our paper Copyright Violations and Large Language Models was accepted to EMNLP 2023!
